column4: Microsoft recalls 2.3 million power cords sold with Surface Pro tablets
column5: The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission said Microsoft Corp was recalling about 2.25 million AC power cords  less than a week after Apple Inc said it was recalling AC wall plug adapters due to a shock hazard.

column4: Microsoft recalls 2.3 mln power cords sold with Surface Pro tablets
column5: Feb 2 The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission said Microsoft Corp was recalling about 2.25 million AC power cords  less than a week after Apple Inc  said it was recalling AC wall plug adapters due to a shock hazard.

column4: Magic Leap raises $793.5 mln in funding round led by Alibaba
column5: Feb 2 Magic Leap Inc  a startup focused on augmented reality technology  said on Tuesday it had raised $793.5 million in a funding round led by Chinese ecommerce giant Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.
